statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT item_name, item_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'Electronics' AND quantity < 5 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_type FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'Electronics' AND expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'Clothing' OR item_type = 'Shoes' ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, expiration_date FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT id, drug_name, quantity FROM drugs WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT location, item_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 50
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT id, item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date < NOW() ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT id, drug_name FROM drugs ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM medical_equipment;
SELECT name, quantity FROM medical_equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, purchase_date FROM medical_equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, description FROM supplies WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM drugs ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, strength DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM medical_equipment WHERE quantity > 10 AND manufacturer = 'Acme Healthcare';
SELECT id, name, purchase_date FROM medical_equipment WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE description ILIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_equipment;
SELECT name, quantity FROM drugs ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM medical_equipment WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE quantity < 10 AND supplier = 'ABC Company';
SELECT id, item_type, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY available_quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity, location FROM medical_equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, supplier FROM supplies WHERE supplier LIKE '%Company%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT id, name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'medical_equipment' AND available_quantity > 0;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM medical_equipment UNION SELECT id, name, quantity FROM supplies;
SELECT * FROM medical_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM medical_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT drug_name, expiry_date FROM drugs ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE supplier_id = 12345;
SELECT equipment_id, log_description, log_date FROM equipment_logs WHERE equipment_id = 1001 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM medical_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT drug_name, expiry_date FROM drugs WHERE expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM supplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, log_description, log_date FROM equipment_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
